thread.title: Cuyahoga Falls' Front Street Mall could open to vehicles in 9 months
thread.title_full: Cuyahoga Falls' Front Street Mall could open to vehicles in 9 months

author: Jennifer Conn, Akron reporter, cleveland.com
title: Cuyahoga Falls' Front Street Mall could open to vehicles in 9 months
text: Akron-based H.R. Gray has been selected to lead completion of Cuyahoga Falls Downtown Transformation Design-Build Project, which with City Council approval could open Front Street to cars by New Year's Day, months ahead of schedule.
